text: aur (he nabee!) hamane nahin bheja aapase poorv kisee rasool aur na kisee nabee ko, kintu jab, usane (pustak) padhee, to sanshay daal diya shaitaan ne usake padhane mein. phir nirast kar deta hai allaah shaitaan ke sanshay ko, phir sudrdh kar deta hai allaah apanee aayaton ko aur allaah sarvagy, tatvagy[1] hai
